title: Diversified farming
body: I would like to see a "farm all" option. a farm all would take the token/coin of your choice, which you store in your wallet, and automatically convert it to every LP pair available on pancakeswap. this diversification, imo, would greatly reduce the risk of impermanent loss. Of course, there is definitely some development hurdles to overcome with this. perhaps the way of the future is a single farm containing EVERY token the dex provides liquidity for.
choices: Sounds like it needs some developer attention
No this is a horrible idea and you're an idiot
Idk what the hell you're talking about
author: 0x09CbA11872702c73287Ce93A0e1B8Ca7866B211c
